tool_meta_description: A tool to apply the 1-3-7 spaced repetition method. Add what you've studied and check off your reviews to learn effectively.
tool_meta_keywords: review tool, spaced repetition, study schedule, learning tool, 1-3-7 method
how_to_use_step1_desc: Review the material for the first time the day after you learn it. This is the most critical step to strengthen the initial memory trace.
how_to_use_step2_desc: Review the material again three days after the initial learning session. This helps transition the memory from short-term to long-term.
how_to_use_step3_desc: The final review happens seven days after the initial session. This solidifies the knowledge for long-term retention.
